### EXISTING STRUCTURES

- Furnace (position unknown)

### Coal mine at position (unknown)

### Iron plate factory at position (unknown)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position unknown)
- Inserter (position unknown)
- Beltgroup (position unknown)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough resources in your inventory to craft the desired items. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheels requires iron-plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when inspecting entities
- Verify that the entity you are trying to inspect is correctly placed and operational to avoid empty inventories during inspections.
